channel.title: A check if a player is viewing a sidebar?
channel.description:
How would I make a check if a player is viewing a sidebar? I need it for tutorial island.
My sidebar method is [CODE=java]c.packetSender().sendSidebar(SidebarID, Interface);[/CODE]
And I'm trying to find out how I'd check if a player is viewing that. For example I'd need something like
[CODE=java]if(viewingSidebar(SidebarID)){[/CODE]
But I'm not sure how I'd go about doing that. Any help?
